author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CENTER OF MELISSA EMERGING FROM THE NORTHERN COAST OF WESTERN JAMAICA... ...DAMAGING WINDS. CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING, AND LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE CONTINUES IN JAMAICA...
summary: ...CENTER OF MELISSA EMERGING FROM THE NORTHERN COAST OF WESTERN JAMAICA... ...DAMAGING WINDS. CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING, AND LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE CONTINUES IN JAMAICA... As of 5:00 PM EDT Tue Oct 28 the center of Melissa was located near 18.5, -77.7 with movement NNE at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 921 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 145 mph.

CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING, AND LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE CONTINUES IN JAMAICA... As of 5:00 PM EDT Tue Oct 28 the center of Melissa was located near 18.5, -77.7 with movement NNE at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 921 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 145 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
